The obsession with Simplicity is what separates Apple from other technology companies. It‚Äôs what helped Apple recover from near death in 1997 to become the most valuable company on Earth in 2011.Segall has a unique perspective given his years of experience creating campaigns for other iconic tech companies including IBM Intel and Dell.
